rows.label: tlk42400011_03_msg0002
rows.name:
If you develop Avaritia and complete
Mercenary Group missions, the number of
products in the shops will increase, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400011_03_msg0003
rows.name:
If you buy all the products,
you'll be given the right
to become an owner, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400011_03_msg0004
rows.name:
Becoming Owner even give
you perks, like being able
to hold lots of items!

rows.label: tlk42400011_03_msg0005
rows.name:
That's what Etoeto's
boyfriend taught me, mo!
